title: UCANBE Athena Face Body Paint Oil Palette, Professional Flash Non Toxic Safe Tattoo Halloween FX Party Artist Fancy Makeup Painting Kit For Kids and Adult
descriptions:
Introducing the UCANBE Athena Face Body Paint Oil Palette, the ultimate professional makeup painting kit for both kids and adults. Whether it's Halloween, a special FX party, or an artistic event, this palette has got you covered!

Featuring a wide array of 20 vibrant colors, including gold, silver, pink, purple, red, yellow, blue, green, brown, black, and white, this palette offers endless possibilities for creative looks. The creamy and intensive pigmentation ensures color-saturated coverage that is sure to make a statement.

The sturdy and convenient plastic case keeps your palette safe and organized, making it perfect for on-the-go artists. The palette is easy to use with either a sponge or brush, allowing for effortless application.

Not only is this face body paint non-toxic, but it is also oil-based and skin-friendly, ensuring a comfortable and gentle experience. The high-quality formulation is easy to blend, quick-drying, and smudge-proof, providing long-lasting and durable results. Minimal rub-off means your designs will stay intact throughout the day or night.

When it's time to remove your masterpiece, simply use olive oil or a professional waterproof makeup remover. The easy-to-wear and wash off formula makes cleanup a breeze.

This UCANBE Athena Face Body Paint Oil Palette is perfect for festivals, carnivals, birthday parties, campfires, theme parties, stage performances, and of course, Halloween. Let your imagination run wild and create stunning looks such as crowns, costumes, bruises, blood effects, and even cosplay.

Suitable for both kids and adults, this professional flash non-toxic safe tattoo Halloween FX party artist fancy makeup painting kit is a must-have for any makeup enthusiast. Unleash your creativity and make a statement with the UCANBE Athena Face Body Paint Oil Palette today!
